data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 22333, Version Hash: 76f317c0de4b335c5f692213a60f2fe4d1679c4e
data.actual_result: You join the **server** but do not automatically join the **voice channel**
data.expected_result: You should automatically join the **voice channel**
data.short_description: Invite to **voice channel** does not work when using that invite link to create a new discord account
data.steps_to_repro: - Have an invite link to a voice channel - go to a browser where there is no discord user logged in (like incognito mode) - enter the link and put in a username (make sure it doesnt say beaming info to discord app) - complete the captcha and join the server as a new discord account
